dn21:1.1.2: ekam samayam bhagava magadhesu viharati, pacinato rajagahassa ambasanda nama brahmanagamo, tassuttarato vediyake pabbate indasalaguhayam.
dn21:1.1.3: Tena kho pana samayena sakkassa devanamindassa ussukkam udapadi bhagavantam dassanaya.
dn21:1.1.5: “kaham nu kho bhagava etarahi viharati araham sammasambuddho”ti?
dn21:1.1.6: Addasa kho sakko devanamindo bhagavantam magadhesu viharantam pacinato rajagahassa ambasanda nama brahmanagamo, tassuttarato vediyake pabbate indasalaguhayam.
dn21:1.1.8: “ayam, marisa, bhagava magadhesu viharati, pacinato rajagahassa ambasanda nama brahmanagamo, tassuttarato vediyake pabbate indasalaguhayam.
dn21:1.1.9: Yadi pana, marisa, mayam tam bhagavantam dassanaya upasankameyyama arahantam sammasambuddhan”ti?
dn21:1.1.10: “Evam, bhaddantava”ti kho deva tavatimsa sakkassa devanamindassa paccassosum.
dn21:1.2.1: Atha kho sakko devanamindo pancasikham gandhabbadevaputtam amantesi:
dn21:1.2.2: “ayam, tata pancasikha, bhagava magadhesu viharati pacinato rajagahassa ambasanda nama brahmanagamo, tassuttarato vediyake pabbate indasalaguhayam.
dn21:1.2.3: Yadi pana, tata pancasikha, mayam tam bhagavantam dassanaya upasankameyyama arahantam sammasambuddhan”ti?
dn21:1.2.4: “Evam, bhaddantava”ti kho pancasikho gandhabbadevaputto sakkassa devanamindassa patissutva beluvapanduvinam adaya sakkassa devanamindassa anucariyam upagami.
dn21:1.2.5: Atha kho sakko devanamindo devehi tavatimsehi parivuto pancasikhena gandhabbadevaputtena purakkhato—
dn21:1.2.6: seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evameva—devesu tavatimsesu antarahito magadhesu pacinato rajagahassa ambasanda nama brahmanagamo, tassuttarato vediyake pabbate paccutthasi.
dn21:1.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena vediyako pabbato atiriva obhasajato hoti ambasanda ca brahmanagamo yatha tam devanam devanubhavena.
dn21:1.3.3: “adittassu namajja vediyako pabbato jhayatisu namajja vediyako pabbato jalatisu. Namajja vediyako pabbato.
dn21:1.3.4: Kimsu namajja vediyako pabbato atiriva obhasajato ambasanda ca brahmanagamo”ti;
dn21:1.4.1: Atha kho sakko devanamindo pancasikham gandhabbadevaputtam amantesi:
dn21:1.4.2: “durupasankama kho, tata pancasikha, tathagata madisena, jhayi jhanarata, tadantaram patisallina.
dn21:1.4.3: Yadi pana tvam, tata pancasikha, bhagavantam pathamam pasadeyyasi, taya, tata, pathamam pasaditam paccha mayam tam bhagavantam dassanaya upasankameyyama arahantam sammasambuddhan”ti.
dn21:1.4.4: “Evam, bhaddantava”ti kho pancasikho gandhabbadevaputto sakkassa devanamindassa patissutva beluvapanduvinam adaya yena indasalaguha tenupasankami; upasankamitva:
dn21:1.4.5: “ettavata me bhagava neva atidure bhavissati naccasanne, saddanca me sossati”ti—
dn21:1.4.8: Ekamantam thito kho pancasikho gandhabbadevaputto beluvapanduvinam assavesi, ima ca gatha abhasi buddhupasanhita dhammupasanhita sanghupasanhita arahantupasanhita kamupasanhita:
dn21:1.6.1: Evam vutte, bhagava pancasikham gandhabbadevaputtam etadavoca:
dn21:1.6.2: “samsandati kho te, pancasikha, tantissaro gitassarena, gitassaro ca tantissarena;
dn21:1.6.3: na ca pana te, pancasikha, tantissaro gitassaram ativattati, gitassaro ca tantissaram.
dn21:1.6.4: Kada samyulha pana te, pancasikha, ima gatha buddhupasanhita dhammupasanhita sanghupasanhita arahantupasanhita kamupasanhita”ti?
dn21:1.6.5: “Ekamidam, bhante, samayam bhagava uruvelayam viharati najja neranjaraya tire ajapalanigrodhe pathamabhisambuddho.
dn21:1.6.6: Tena kho panaham, bhante, samayena bhadda nama suriyavacchasa timbaruno gandhabbaranno dhita, tamabhikankhami.
dn21:1.6.7: Sa kho pana, bhante, bhagini parakamini hoti;
dn21:1.6.8: sikhandi nama matalissa sangahakassa putto, tamabhikankhati.
dn21:1.6.9: Yato kho aham, bhante, tam bhaginim nalattham kenaci pariyayena.
dn21:1.6.10: Athaham beluvapanduvinam adaya yena timbaruno gandhabbaranno nivesanam tenupasankamim; upasankamitva beluvapanduvinam assavesim, ima ca gatha abhasim buddhupasanhita dhammupasanhita sanghupasanhita arahantupasanhita kamupasanhita—
dn21:1.7.10: Evam vutte, bhante, bhadda suriyavacchasa mam etadavoca:
dn21:1.7.11: ‘na kho me, marisa, so bhagava sammukha dittho, api ca sutoyeva me so bhagava devanam tavatimsanam sudhammayam sabhayam upanaccantiya.
dn21:1.7.12: Yato kho tvam, marisa, tam bhagavantam kittesi, hotu no ajja samagamo’ti.
dn21:1.7.13: Soyeva no, bhante, tassa bhaginiya saddhim samagamo ahosi.
dn21:1.8.2: “patisammodati pancasikho gandhabbadevaputto bhagavata, bhagava ca pancasikhena”ti.
dn21:1.8.3: Atha kho sakko devanamindo pancasikham gandhabbadevaputtam amantesi:
dn21:1.8.5: ‘sakko, bhante, devanamindo samacco saparijano bhagavato pade sirasa vandati’”ti.
dn21:1.8.6: “Evam, bhaddantava”ti kho pancasikho gandhabbadevaputto sakkassa devanamindassa patissutva bhagavantam abhivadeti:
dn21:1.8.7: “sakko, bhante, devanamindo samacco saparijano bhagavato pade sirasa vandati”ti.
dn21:1.8.8: “Evam sukhi hotu, pancasikha, sakko devanamindo samacco saparijano;
dn21:1.8.9: sukhakama hi deva manussa asura naga gandhabba ye canne santi puthukaya”ti.
dn21:1.8.10: Evanca pana tathagata evarupe mahesakkhe yakkhe abhivadanti.
dn21:1.8.11: Abhivadito sakko devanamindo bhagavato indasalaguham pavisitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi.
dn21:1.8.12: Devapi tavatimsa indasalaguham pavisitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthamsu.
dn21:1.8.13: Pancasikhopi gandhabbadevaputto indasalaguham pavisitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi.
dn21:1.9.1: Tena kho pana samayena indasalaguha visama santi sama samapadi, sambadha santi urunda samapadi, andhakaro guhayam antaradhayi, aloko udapadi yatha tam devanam devanubhavena.
dn21:1.9.2: Atha kho bhagava sakkam devanamindam etadavoca:
dn21:1.9.3: “acchariyamidam ayasmato kosiyassa, abbhutamidam ayasmato kosiyassa tava bahukiccassa bahukaraniyassa yadidam idhagamanan”ti.
dn21:1.9.4: “Cirapatikaham, bhante, bhagavantam dassanaya upasankamitukamo; api ca devanam tavatimsanam kehici kehici kiccakaraniyehi byavato; evaham nasakkhim bhagavantam dassanaya upasankamitum.
dn21:1.9.5: Ekamidam, bhante, samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati salalagarake.
dn21:1.9.6: Atha khvaham, bhante, savatthim agamasim bhagavantam dassanaya.
dn21:1.10.1: Tena kho pana, bhante, samayena bhagava annatarena samadhina nisinno hoti, bhujati ca nama vessavanassa maharajassa paricarika bhagavantam paccupatthita hoti, panjalika namassamana titthati.
dn21:1.10.4: “sakko, bhante, devanamindo samacco saparijano bhagavato pade sirasa vandati”’ti.
dn21:1.10.5: Evam vutte, bhante, sa bhujati mam etadavoca:
dn21:1.10.8: ‘Tena hi, bhagini, yada bhagava tamha samadhimha vutthito hoti, atha mama vacanena bhagavantam abhivadehi:
dn21:1.10.9: “sakko, bhante, devanamindo samacco saparijano bhagavato pade sirasa vandati”’ti.
dn21:1.10.10: Kacci me sa, bhante, bhagini bhagavantam abhivadesi?
dn21:1.10.12: “Abhivadesi mam sa, devanaminda, bhagini, saramaham tassa bhaginiya vacanam.
dn21:1.10.13: Api caham ayasmato nemisaddena tamha samadhimha vutthito”ti.
dn21:1.11.1: “Ye te, bhante, deva amhehi pathamataram tavatimsakayam upapanna, tesam me sammukha sutam sammukha patiggahitam:
dn21:1.11.2: ‘yada tathagata loke uppajjanti arahanto sammasambuddha, dibba kaya paripurenti, hayanti asurakaya’ti.
dn21:1.11.3: Tam me idam, bhante, sakkhidittham yato tathagato loke uppanno araham sammasambuddho, dibba kaya paripurenti, hayanti asurakayati.
dn21:1.11.5: Idheva, bhante, kapilavatthusmim gopika nama sakyadhita ahosi buddhe pasanna dhamme pasanna sanghe pasanna silesu paripurakarini.
dn21:1.11.6: Sa itthittam virajetva purisattam bhavetva kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapanna.
dn21:1.11.7: Devanam tavatimsanam sahabyatam amhakam puttattam ajjhupagata.
dn21:1.11.10: Annepi, bhante, tayo bhikkhu bhagavati brahmacariyam caritva hinam gandhabbakayam upapanna.
dn21:1.11.11: Te pancahi kamagunehi samappita samangibhuta paricarayamana amhakam upatthanam agacchanti amhakam paricariyam.
dn21:1.11.12: Te amhakam upatthanam agate amhakam paricariyam gopako devaputto paticodesi:
dn21:1.11.13: ‘kutomukha nama tumhe, marisa, tassa bhagavato dhammam assuttha—
dn21:1.11.14: ahanhi nama itthika samana buddhe pasanna dhamme pasanna sanghe pasanna silesu paripurakarini itthittam virajetva purisattam bhavetva kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapanna, devanam tavatimsanam sahabyatam sakkassa devanamindassa puttattam ajjhupagata.
dn21:1.11.17: Tumhe pana, marisa, bhagavati brahmacariyam caritva hinam gandhabbakayam upapanna.
dn21:1.11.18: Duddittharupam vata bho addasama, ye mayam addasama sahadhammike hinam gandhabbakayam upapanne’ti.
dn21:1.11.19: Tesam, bhante, gopakena devaputtena paticoditanam dve deva dittheva dhamme satim patilabhimsu kayam brahmapurohitam, eko pana devo kame ajjhavasi.
dn21:1.13.2: “digharattam visuddho kho ayam yakkho, yam kinci mam panham pucchissati, sabbam tam atthasanhitamyeva pucchissati, no anatthasanhitam.
dn21:1.13.3: Yancassaham puttho byakarissami, tam khippameva ajanissati”ti.
dn21:1.13.4: Atha kho bhagava sakkam devanamindam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
dn21:2.1.1: Katavakaso sakko devanamindo bhagavata imam bhagavantam pathamam panham apucchi:
dn21:2.1.2: “Kimsamyojana nu kho, marisa, deva manussa asura naga gandhabba ye canne santi puthukaya, te:
dn21:2.1.3: ‘avera adanda asapatta abyapajja viharemu averino’ti iti ca nesam hoti, atha ca pana savera sadanda sasapatta sabyapajja viharanti saverino”ti?
dn21:2.1.4: Ittham sakko devanamindo bhagavantam panham apucchi.
dn21:2.1.6: “Issamacchariyasamyojana kho, devanaminda, deva manussa asura naga gandhabba ye canne santi puthukaya, te:
dn21:2.1.7: ‘avera adanda asapatta abyapajja viharemu averino’ti iti ca nesam hoti, atha ca pana savera sadanda sasapatta sabyapajja viharanti saverino”ti.
dn21:2.1.8: Ittham bhagava sakkassa devanamindassa panham puttho byakasi.
dn21:2.1.9: Attamano sakko devanamindo bhagavato bhasitam abhinandi anumodi:
dn21:2.1.11: Tinna mettha kankha vigata kathankatha bhagavato panhaveyyakaranam sutva”ti.
dn21:2.2.1: Itiha sakko devanamindo bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva bhagavantam uttari panham apucchi:
dn21:2.2.2: “Issamacchariyam pana, marisa, kimnidanam kimsamudayam kimjatikam kimpabhavam;
dn21:2.2.5: “Issamacchariyam kho, devanaminda, piyappiyanidanam piyappiyasamudayam piyappiyajatikam piyappiyapabhavam;
dn21:2.2.8: “Piyappiyam pana, marisa, kimnidanam kimsamudayam kimjatikam kimpabhavam;
dn21:2.2.11: “Piyappiyam kho, devanaminda, chandanidanam chandasamudayam chandajatikam chandapabhavam;
dn21:2.2.14: “Chando pana, marisa, kimnidano kimsamudayo kimjatiko kimpabhavo;
dn21:2.2.17: “Chando kho, devanaminda, vitakkanidano vitakkasamudayo vitakkajatiko vitakkapabhavo;
dn21:2.2.20: “Vitakko pana, marisa, kimnidano kimsamudayo kimjatiko kimpabhavo;
dn21:2.2.23: “Vitakko kho, devanaminda, papancasannasankhanidano papancasannasankhasamudayo papancasannasankhajatiko papancasannasankhapabhavo;
dn21:2.3.1: “Katham patipanno pana, marisa, bhikkhu papancasannasankhanirodhasaruppagaminim patipadam patipanno hoti”ti?
dn21:2.3.9: Somanassampaham, devanaminda, duvidhena vadami sevitabbampi, asevitabbampiti iti kho panetam vuttam, kincetam paticca vuttam?
dn21:2.3.11: ‘imam kho me somanassam sevato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti’ti, evarupam somanassam na sevitabbam.
dn21:2.3.13: ‘imam kho me somanassam sevato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti’ti, evarupam somanassam sevitabbam.
dn21:2.3.14: Tattha yance savitakkam savicaram, yance avitakkam avicaram, ye avitakke avicare, te panitatare.
dn21:2.3.15: Somanassampaham, devanaminda, duvidhena vadami sevitabbampi, asevitabbampiti.
dn21:2.3.16: Iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttam.
dn21:2.3.17: Domanassampaham, devanaminda, duvidhena vadami sevitabbampi, asevitabbampiti iti kho panetam vuttam, kincetam paticca vuttam?
dn21:2.3.19: ‘imam kho me domanassam sevato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti’ti, evarupam domanassam na sevitabbam.
dn21:2.3.21: ‘imam kho me domanassam sevato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti’ti, evarupam domanassam sevitabbam.
dn21:2.3.22: Tattha yance savitakkam savicaram, yance avitakkam avicaram, ye avitakke avicare, te panitatare.
dn21:2.3.23: Domanassampaham, devanaminda, duvidhena vadami sevitabbampi, asevitabbampiti
dn21:2.3.24: iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttam.
dn21:2.3.25: Upekkhampaham, devanaminda, duvidhena vadami sevitabbampi, asevitabbampiti iti kho panetam vuttam, kincetam paticca vuttam?
dn21:2.3.27: ‘imam kho me upekkham sevato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti’ti, evarupa upekkha na sevitabba.
dn21:2.3.29: ‘imam kho me upekkham sevato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti’ti, evarupa upekkha sevitabba.
dn21:2.3.30: Tattha yance savitakkam savicaram, yance avitakkam avicaram, ye avitakke avicare, te panitatare.
dn21:2.3.31: Upekkhampaham, devanaminda, duvidhena vadami sevitabbampi, asevitabbampiti
dn21:2.3.32: iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttam.
dn21:2.3.33: Evam patipanno kho, devanaminda, bhikkhu papancasannasankhanirodhasaruppagaminim patipadam patipanno hoti”ti.
dn21:2.3.34: Ittham bhagava sakkassa devanamindassa panham puttho byakasi.
dn21:2.3.35: Attamano sakko devanamindo bhagavato bhasitam abhinandi anumodi:
dn21:2.3.37: Tinna mettha kankha vigata kathankatha bhagavato panhaveyyakaranam sutva”ti.
dn21:2.4.1: Itiha sakko devanamindo bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva bhagavantam uttari panham apucchi:
dn21:2.4.2: “Katham patipanno pana, marisa, bhikkhu patimokkhasamvaraya patipanno hoti”ti?
dn21:2.4.9: Kayasamacarampaham, devanaminda, duvidhena vadami sevitabbampi asevitabbampiti iti kho panetam vuttam, kincetam paticca vuttam?
dn21:2.4.11: ‘imam kho me kayasamacaram sevato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti’ti, evarupo kayasamacaro na sevitabbo.
dn21:2.4.13: ‘imam kho me kayasamacaram sevato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti’ti, evarupo kayasamacaro sevitabbo.
dn21:2.4.16: iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttam.
dn21:2.4.18: sevitabbampi, asevitabbampiti iti kho panetam vuttam, kincetam paticca vuttam?
dn21:2.4.19: Tattha yam janna vacisamacaram ‘imam kho me vacisamacaram sevato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti’ti, evarupo vacisamacaro na sevitabbo.
dn21:2.4.20: Tattha yam janna vacisamacaram ‘imam kho me vacisamacaram sevato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti’ti, evarupo vacisamacaro sevitabbo.
dn21:2.4.23: iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttam.
dn21:2.4.25: sevitabbampi, asevitabbampiti iti kho panetam vuttam, kincetam paticca vuttam?
dn21:2.4.26: Tattha yam janna pariyesanam ‘imam kho me pariyesanam sevato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti’ti, evarupa pariyesana na sevitabba.
dn21:2.4.27: Tattha yam janna pariyesanam ‘imam kho me pariyesanam sevato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti’ti, evarupa pariyesana sevitabba.
dn21:2.4.30: iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttam.
dn21:2.4.31: Evam patipanno kho, devanaminda, bhikkhu patimokkhasamvaraya patipanno hoti”ti.
dn21:2.4.32: Ittham bhagava sakkassa devanamindassa panham puttho byakasi.
dn21:2.4.33: Attamano sakko devanamindo bhagavato bhasitam abhinandi anumodi:
dn21:2.4.35: Tinna mettha kankha vigata kathankatha bhagavato panhaveyyakaranam sutva”ti.
dn21:2.5.1: Itiha sakko devanamindo bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva bhagavantam uttari panham apucchi:
dn21:2.5.2: “Katham patipanno pana, marisa, bhikkhu indriyasamvaraya patipanno hoti”ti?
dn21:2.5.15: Evam vutte, sakko devanamindo bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn21:2.5.16: “Imassa kho aham, bhante, bhagavata sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attham ajanami.
dn21:2.5.17: Yatharupam, bhante, cakkhuvinneyyam rupam sevato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti, evarupam cakkhuvinneyyam rupam na sevitabbam.
dn21:2.5.18: Yatharupanca kho, bhante, cakkhuvinneyyam rupam sevato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, evarupam cakkhuvinneyyam rupam sevitabbam.
dn21:2.5.19: Yatharupanca kho, bhante, sotavinneyyam saddam sevato …pe…
dn21:2.5.23: manovinneyyam dhammam sevato akusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, kusala dhamma parihayanti, evarupo manovinneyyo dhammo na sevitabbo.
dn21:2.5.24: Yatharupanca kho, bhante, manovinneyyam dhammam sevato akusala dhamma parihayanti, kusala dhamma abhivaddhanti, evarupo manovinneyyo dhammo sevitabbo.
dn21:2.5.25: Imassa kho me, bhante, bhagavata sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attham ajanato
dn21:2.5.26: tinna mettha kankha vigata kathankatha bhagavato panhaveyyakaranam sutva”ti.
dn21:2.6.1: Itiha sakko devanamindo bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva bhagavantam uttari panham apucchi:
dn21:2.6.2: “Sabbeva nu kho, marisa, samanabrahmana ekantavada ekantasila ekantachanda ekantaajjhosana”ti?
dn21:2.6.3: “Na kho, devanaminda, sabbe samanabrahmana ekantavada ekantasila ekantachanda ekantaajjhosana”ti.
dn21:2.6.4: “Kasma pana, marisa, na sabbe samanabrahmana ekantavada ekantasila ekantachanda ekantaajjhosana”ti?
dn21:2.6.6: Tasmim anekadhatunanadhatusmim loke yam yadeva satta dhatum abhinivisanti, tam tadeva thamasa paramasa abhinivissa voharanti:
dn21:2.6.8: Tasma na sabbe samanabrahmana ekantavada ekantasila ekantachanda ekantaajjhosana”ti.
dn21:2.6.9: “Sabbeva nu kho, marisa, samanabrahmana accantanittha accantayogakkhemi accantabrahmacari accantapariyosana”ti?
dn21:2.6.10: “Na kho, devanaminda, sabbe samanabrahmana accantanittha accantayogakkhemi accantabrahmacari accantapariyosana”ti.
dn21:2.6.11: “Kasma pana, marisa, na sabbe samanabrahmana accantanittha accantayogakkhemi accantabrahmacari accantapariyosana”ti?
dn21:2.6.12: “Ye kho, devanaminda, bhikkhu tanhasankhayavimutta te accantanittha accantayogakkhemi accantabrahmacari accantapariyosana.
dn21:2.6.13: Tasma na sabbe samanabrahmana accantanittha accantayogakkhemi accantabrahmacari accantapariyosana”ti.
dn21:2.6.14: Ittham bhagava sakkassa devanamindassa panham puttho byakasi.
dn21:2.6.15: Attamano sakko devanamindo bhagavato bhasitam abhinandi anumodi:
dn21:2.6.17: Tinna mettha kankha vigata kathankatha bhagavato panhaveyyakaranam sutva”ti.
dn21:2.6.18: Itiha sakko devanamindo bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva bhagavantam etadavoca:
dn21:2.7.1: “Eja, bhante, rogo, eja gando, eja sallam, eja imam purisam parikaddhati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiya.
dn21:2.7.3: Yesaham, bhante, panhanam ito bahiddha annesu samanabrahmanesu okasakammampi nalattham, te me bhagavata byakata.
dn21:2.7.4: Digharattanusayitanca pana me vicikicchakathankathasallam, tanca bhagavata abbulhan”ti.
dn21:2.7.5: “Abhijanasi no tvam, devanaminda, ime panhe anne samanabrahmane pucchita”ti?
dn21:2.7.6: “Abhijanamaham, bhante, ime panhe anne samanabrahmane pucchita”ti.
dn21:2.7.7: “Yatha katham pana te, devanaminda, byakamsu? Sace te agaru bhasassu”ti.
dn21:2.7.8: “Na kho me, bhante, garu yatthassa bhagava nisinno bhagavantarupo va”ti.
dn21:2.7.10: “Yesvaham, bhante, mannami samanabrahmana arannika pantasenasanati, tyaham upasankamitva ime panhe pucchami, te maya puttha na sampayanti, asampayanta mamamyeva patipucchanti:
dn21:2.7.15: ‘kim panayasma, devanaminda, kammam katva imam thanam patto’ti?
dn21:2.7.18: ‘sakko ca no devanamindo dittho, yanca no apucchimha, tanca no byakasi’ti.
dn21:2.7.19: Te annadatthu mamamyeva savaka sampajjanti, na caham tesam.
dn21:2.7.20: Aham kho pana, bhante, bhagavato savako sotapanno avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano”ti.
dn21:2.7.22: “Abhijanasi no tvam, devanaminda, ito pubbe evarupam vedapatilabham somanassapatilabhan”ti?
dn21:2.7.23: “Abhijanamaham, bhante, ito pubbe evarupam vedapatilabham somanassapatilabhan”ti.
dn21:2.7.24: “Yatha katham pana tvam, devanaminda, abhijanasi ito pubbe evarupam vedapatilabham somanassapatilabhan”ti?
dn21:2.7.26: Tasmim kho pana, bhante, sangame deva jinimsu, asura parajayimsu.
dn21:2.7.27: Tassa mayham, bhante, tam sangamam abhivijinitva vijitasangamassa etadahosi:
dn21:2.7.28: ‘ya ceva dani dibba oja ya ca asura oja, ubhayametam deva paribhunjissanti’ti.
dn21:2.7.29: So kho pana me, bhante, vedapatilabho somanassapatilabho sadandavacaro sasatthavacaro na nibbidaya na viragaya na nirodhaya na upasamaya na abhinnaya na sambodhaya na nibbanaya samvattati.
dn21:2.7.30: Yo kho pana me ayam, bhante, bhagavato dhammam sutva vedapatilabho somanassapatilabho, so adandavacaro asatthavacaro ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati”ti.
dn21:2.8.1: “Kim pana tvam, devanaminda, atthavasam sampassamano evarupam vedapatilabham somanassapatilabham pavedesi”ti?
dn21:2.8.2: “Cha kho aham, bhante, atthavase sampassamano evarupam vedapatilabham somanassapatilabham pavedemi.
dn21:2.8.7: Imam kho aham, bhante, pathamam atthavasam sampassamano evarupam vedapatilabham somanassapatilabham pavedemi.
dn21:2.8.12: Imam kho aham, bhante, dutiyam atthavasam sampassamano evarupam vedapatilabham somanassapatilabham pavedemi.
dn21:2.8.17: Imam kho aham, bhante, tatiyam atthavasam sampassamano evarupam vedapatilabham somanassapatilabham pavedemi.
dn21:2.8.22: Imam kho aham, bhante, catuttham atthavasam sampassamano evarupam vedapatilabham somanassapatilabham pavedemi.
dn21:2.8.27: Imam kho aham, bhante, pancamam atthavasam sampassamano evarupam vedapatilabham somanassapatilabham pavedemi.
dn21:2.8.32: Imam kho aham, bhante, chattham atthavasam sampassamano evarupam vedapatilabham somanassapatilabham pavedemi.
dn21:2.8.33: Ime kho aham, bhante, cha atthavase sampassamano evarupam vedapatilabham somanassapatilabham pavedemi.
dn21:2.10.1: Atha kho sakko devanamindo pancasikham gandhabbaputtam amantesi:
dn21:2.10.2: “bahupakaro kho mesi tvam, tata pancasikha, yam tvam bhagavantam pathamam pasadesi.
dn21:2.10.3: Taya, tata, pathamam pasaditam paccha mayam tam bhagavantam dassanaya upasankamimha arahantam sammasambuddham.
dn21:2.10.4: Pettike va thane thapayissami, gandhabbaraja bhavissasi, bhaddanca te suriyavacchasam dammi, sa hi te abhipatthita”ti.
dn21:2.10.5: Atha kho sakko devanamindo panina pathavim paramasitva tikkhattum udanam udanesi:
dn21:2.10.9: Imasminca pana veyyakaranasmim bhannamane sakkassa devanamindassa virajam vitamalam dhammacakkhum udapadi:
dn21:2.10.12: iti ye sakkena devanamindena ajjhitthapanha puttha, te bhagavata byakata.
